paramInformation.label: Buzzer Beep Times
paramInformation.description: 0 : disable  1~100: sound 1~100 beeps (0.5s on, 0.5s off) 127: continue beep till cancel trigger

metadata.inclusion:
Push the button three times in 1.5 seconds.
When inclusion successful, the LED will be RED blink three times.
metadata.exclusion:
Push the button three times in 1.5 seconds.
When exclusion successful, the LED will be RED blink three times. And the LED will be red blinking for 30 seconds at one blink per two seconds. The device is now waiting to inclusion.
metadata.reset:
Push the button three times in 1.5 seconds and hold the third push for 10 seconds till the LED is red blinking. When reset is successful, the device is set to factory default and now waiting to inclusion
Please use this procedure only when the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable
